## R Markdown

Read the layer
```{r}
library(raster)

```

get the area



```{r , echo=FALSE}
library(patchwork)
layout <- "
AB
AB"
 swiss_plot+   
  plot_gunni+
  plot_layout(design = layout) +
  plot_annotation(tag_levels = 'A', title = '',
  subtitle = '',
  caption = '') +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggsave("figs/metrics.png",dpi=300, dev='png',  height=10, width=12,units="in")
```
